entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks had appeared out of nowhere, her mousy hair wet with sleet. She watched them through the door of the Three Broomsticks.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: ‘Mundungus will probably be in London by now . There’s no point yelling.’ ‘He’s nicked Sirius’s stuff! Nicked it!’

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry burst out, ‘He was nicking Sirius’s stuff!’

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: 'I know , Harry , but please don’t shout, people are staring’

relationships.description: ‘Yes, but still,’ said Tonks, who seemed perfectly untroubled by this piece of information, ‘you should get out of the cold.’
Hermione returned to their table a few minutes later holding three bottles of Butter-beer.
